resources.name: GetAll Users - /users
Users
resources.description:
## Criar, listar, atualizar e deletar usuários
### status de retorno:

Sucesso:
- 200
-	201
- 204

Error:

- 400
- 404
- 500

resources.name: Get user - / users/:id
resources.description:
#### Essa rota precisa de autenticação

### Retorno esperado
**STATUS 200 OK**
#### Retorno de um único usuário
```json
{
	"id": 1,
	"userName": "mayson",
	"email": "mayson@mail.com",
	"isAdmin": true,
	"userInfos": {
		"name": "Mayson Peth",
		"cpf": "12345678910",
		"birthDate": "2002-05-23",
		"phone": {
			"cellPhone": "79999633653",
			"landLine": "123456789101112"
		},
		"academic": {
			"institution": "Instituto Federal de Sergipe",
			"degree": "Superior incompleto",
			"lattes": "http://linkdolattes.com"
		},
		"address": {
			"address": "rua mayson reis",
			"district": "serrano",
			"cep": "49503141",
			"state": "se",
			"city": "itabaiana"
		}
	},
	"createdAt": "2023-03-23",
	"updatedAt": "2023-03-23",
	"deletedAt": null
}
```

resources.name: Register - /users
resources.description:
### Campos de envio
- userName - string | carac. max 45
- password - string | carac. min 8
- email - string | carac. max 30
- isAdmin - boolean | default false
- createdAt - date
- updatedAt - date
- deletedAt - date | default null
- userInfos - object
	##### Dados do userInfos
	- name - string | carac. max 45
	- cpf - string | carac. max 11
	- birthDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	- phone - object
		##### Dados do phone
		- cellPhone - string | carac. max 11
		- landLine - string | carac. max 15
	- academic - object
		##### Dados Academic
		- institution - string | carac. max 70
		- degree - string | carac. max 70
		- lattes -  string | carac. max 70 | opcional
	- address - object
		##### Dados do address
		- address - string | carac. max 45
		- district - string | carac. max 45
		- cep - string | carac. max 8
		- state - string | carac. max 2 
		- city - string | carac. max 30
	
	
##### Os campos createdAt, updatedAt e deletedAt são criados pelos entidades do banco de dados

### Retorno esperado
**STATUS 201 CREATED**
```json
{
	"id": 5,
	"userName": "mayson",
	"email": "mays2o1n0@mail.com",
	"isAdmin": false,
	"userInfos": {
		"name": "Mayson Peth",
		"cpf": "12342111211",
		"birthDate": "05/23/2002",
		"phone": {
			"cellPhone": "79121132153",
			"landLine": "123256719111212"
		},
		"academic": {
			"institution": "Instituto Federal de Sergipe",
			"degree": "Superior incompleto",
			"lattes": "http://linkdolattes.com"
		},
		"address": {
			"address": "rua mayson reis",
			"district": "serrano",
			"cep": "49503141",
			"state": "se",
			"city": "itabaiana"
		}
	},
	"createdAt": "2023-04-04",
	"updatedAt": "2023-04-04",
	"deletedAt": null
}
```

resources.name: Update - /users/:id
resources.description:
### Deve-se passar um id de um usuário como parametro da URL
### Campos de envio
##### Todos os campos são opcionais
- userName - string | carac. max 45
- password - string | carac. min 8
- email - string | carac. max 30
- isAdmin - boolean | default false
- createdAt - date
- updatedAt - date
- deletedAt - date | default null
- userInfos - object
	##### Dados do userInfos
	- name - string | carac. max 45
	- cpf - string | carac. max 11
	- birthDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	- phone - object
		##### Dados do phone
		- cellPhone - string | carac. max 11
		- landLine - string | carac. max 15
	- academic - object
		##### Dados Academic
		- institution - string | carac. max 70
		- degree - string | carac. max 70
		- lattes -  string | carac. max 70 
	- address - object
		##### Dados do address
		- address - string | carac. max 45
		- district - string | carac. max 45
		- cep - string | carac. max 8
		- state - string | carac. max 2 
		- city - string | carac. max 30
	
	
##### Os campos createdAt, updatedAt e deletedAt são criados pelos entidades do banco de dados

### Retorno esperado
**STATUS 200 OK**
```json
{
	"id": 5,
	"userName": "mayson",
	"email": "mays2o1n0@mail.com",
	"isAdmin": false,
	"userInfos": {
		"name": "Mayson Peth",
		"cpf": "12342111211",
		"birthDate": "05/23/2002",
		"phone": {
			"cellPhone": "79121132153",
			"landLine": "123256719111212"
		},
		"academic": {
			"institution": "Instituto Federal de Sergipe",
			"degree": "Superior incompleto",
			"lattes": "http://linkdolattes.com"
		},
		"address": {
			"address": "rua mayson reis",
			"district": "serrano",
			"cep": "49503141",
			"state": "se",
			"city": "itabaiana"
		}
	},
	"createdAt": "2023-04-04",
	"updatedAt": "2023-04-04",
	"deletedAt": null
}
```

resources.name: Get event- / events/:id
resources.description:
#### Essa rota precisa de autenticação

### Retorno esperado
**STATUS 200 OK**
#### Retorno de um único evento
```json
{
	"id": 1,
	"description": "Evento de programação para Web",
	"location": "IFS - Itabaiana, Auditório principal",
	"eventInfos": {
		"vacancies": 200,
		"registerStartDate": "2023-04-01",
		"registerEndDate": "2023-04-03",
		"eventStartDate": "2023-05-03",
		"eventEndDate": "2023-05-03"
	},

	"updatedAt": "2023-04-01"
}
```

resources.name: Create Event - /events
resources.description:
### Campos de envio
#### Todos são obrigatórios
- description - string 
- location - string 
- createdAt - date
- updatedAt - date
- eventInfos - object
	##### Dados do eventInfos
	- vacancies - number
	- registerStartDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	- registerEndDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	- eventStartDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	- eventEndDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	
##### Os campos createdAt e updatedAt são criados pelos entidades do banco de dados

### Retorno esperado
**STATUS 201 CREATED**
```json
{
	"id": 4,
	"description": "Evento de programação para Web",
	"location": "IFS - Itabaiana, Auditório principal",
	"eventInfos": {
		"vacancies": 200,
		"registerStartDate": "04/01/2023",
		"registerEndDate": "04/03/2023",
		"eventStartDate": "05/03/2023",
		"eventEndDate": "05/03/2023"
	},
	"createdAt": "2023-04-01",
	"updatedAt": "2023-04-01"
}
```

resources.name: Update - /events/:id
resources.description:
### Deve-se passar um id de um evento como parametro da URL
### Campos de envio
#### Todos são opcionais
- description - string 
- location - string 
- createdAt - date
- updatedAt - date
- eventInfos - object
	##### Dados do eventInfos
	- vacancies - number
	- registerStartDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	- registerEndDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	- eventStartDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	- eventEndDate - date | format mm/dd/yyyy
	
##### Os campos createdAt e updatedAt são criados pelos entidades do banco de dados

### Retorno esperado
**STATUS 200 OK**
```json
{
	"id": 4,
	"description": "Evento de programação para Web",
	"location": "IFS - Itabaiana, Auditório principal",
	"eventInfos": {
		"vacancies": 200,
		"registerStartDate": "04/01/2023",
		"registerEndDate": "04/03/2023",
		"eventStartDate": "05/03/2023",
		"eventEndDate": "05/03/2023"
	},
	"createdAt": "2023-04-01",
	"updatedAt": "2023-04-01"
}
```
